output:

and following extensive consultations with our coalition partners,
Saddam Hussein was given one last chance.
He set four very explicit terms to do what he should have done more than six months ago.
Withdrawal from Kuwait without petition.
We have no ambition in your life.
Your sacrifice. You have the gratitude and respect of the American people.
Millions of Americans are praying with you. Now that conflict has come.
On my orders, the United States military must give no strides against our military's
